deleteDataDialogMessage.en: Deleting all Bodhi-related data will close the dapp. You will have to resync when you start Bodhi again. Are you sure?
deleteDataDialogMessage.zh: 在关闭将这个应用的时候，删除所有与菩提相关的数据。当你打开菩提的时候,你必须再次同步这些数据。你确定吗？

earlyAccessDialogMessage.en: Please email contact@bodhi.network for early access.
earlyAccessDialogMessage.zh: 请联系 contact@bodhi.network 获取主链体验版

shutdownDialogMessage.en: Bodhi will now shutdown. Please wait a little before shutting your computer off.
shutdownDialogMessage.zh: 菩提即将关闭。请在关闭您的电脑前等待一段时间。

functionDisabledUntilInitialized.en: This function is disabled until initializing is finished.
functionDisabledUntilInitialized.zh: 初始化完成后方能使用次功能

qtumWalletDialogMessage.en:
You are about to launch the Qtum Wallet. Bodhi will need to be shutdown to run Qtum Wallet. To run Bodhi again, you will have to close the Qtum Wallet and run Bodhi again.

Bodhi will shutdown shortly. Are you sure to want to continue?
qtumWalletDialogMessage.zh:
菩提即将关闭已启动量子钱包。再次启动菩提前，请关闭量子钱包。

菩提即将关闭，请确认是否继续

updateDialogMessage.en: There is a new version available for download on our website. It is advised to update to the latest version. Do you want to go there now?
updateDialogMessage.zh: 全新版本现已上线官网并开放下载，希望广大用户自行更新至最新版本，您还在等什么？
